title: Saucy Salmon Loaf
directions: In a large bowl, flake salmon with a fork, crushing skin and bones. Add breadcrumbs, onion, parsley and tarragon. Mix well. Place mixture in a buttered non-stick 9 x 5 inch (23 x 13 cm) loaf pan.

Beat together eggs, salt and pepper until eggs are just blended. Stir in hot liquid. Pour over salmon mixture in loaf pan. Bake in a 350 째F (180 째C) oven for 30 to 35 minutes or until firm. Loosen loaf with a spatula and turn out of pan.

Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Stir in flour and seasonings. Stir in milk. Cook stirring constantly until sauce thickens and comes to a boil. Cook 1 minute longer. Remove from heat. Add cheese and stir until smooth. Serve with salmon loaf.
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz / 426 g) pink salmon, drained (reserve broth)
3/4 tsp (3 mL) dried tarragon or savory
3/4 cup (180 mL) hot liquid, (reserved salmon broth and milk)
1/2 cup (125 mL) shredded Canadian Cheddar cheese or Canadian Swiss cheese
